data.qsn_name: Please mentioned maximum four major products or services of your enterprises from the given dropdown lists respective sector:
Please give the information on number and types of human resources (all types) currently working in your enterprise
Please provide the following information related to technical human resources presently working in your enterprises. (Use this table to collect department wise information for bigger enterprises)
Please provide the employment status of following occupations in your enterprises as per the mentioned table.
How do you find the average competency level of these technical staffs presently working in your enterprises?
Is there any other specific occupation in your enterprise which you usually feel harder to recruit?
Is it easy to get the trained workforce/human resources to run/operate your business comfortably?

conditional_question.qsn_name: What model/mechanism would you suggest to get trained workers in required number for the enterprises?

data.qsn_name: What is the major source of technical human resources for your enterprises at present?

question_options.option_name: Certified by NSTB as skilled workforces
Trained under CTEVT developed curricula (despite not having NSTB certificate)
Trained under locally developed curricula (other than developed or approved by CTEVT)
Trained under formal training wings of company itself
Self-trained under formal or none formal apprenticeship modality
Having experiences developed working in other companies
Recruit as workers from neighboring and other countries

data.qsn_name: How far the skills acquired by formally trained individuals from the training institutes matches to your business requirement?  Please tick
Do you provide employment to both trained (trained under formal/non formal training programs) and untrained (learned from experience) technical workers in your enterprises?
How you would rate your workers on the following soft skill aspects under the category of 5. Excellent 4. Very good 3. Good 3. Satisfactory 1. Poor
Based on your experience, what was the scope and trend of nature of the business you involved in the past three years ignoring the effect of COVID-19?
In your opinion, what will be the trend of this sort of business in the future (next three or five years)?
What is the future plan of your business?

question_options.option_name: I have plan to continue this business in the same scale
I have plan to continue this business with decreasing its scale
I have plan to continue this business with increasing its scale.
I have plan to shift to another business.
I am going to terminate this business without any alternative plan.

data.qsn_name: Do you plan to adopt the future new technology?

question_options.option_name: Trainees frequently visits our industry for work-place practices
Trainees occasionally visits our industry for OJT as work-place practice
Institutes invites me for curriculum development process.
Institute occasionally invites me for policy level interactions.
